name: Mark Robinson
tweet: Thank you to the Air Force, City of Goldsboro, and Wayne County leadership for meeting with us on our visit. We are excited about the partnership Wayne County Schools and Seymour Johnson are embarking on to give students an incredible opportunity.

name: Mark Robinson
tweet: If we have learned anything from this pandemic, it's that parents deserve a voice in their children's education. The longer these mandates stay in place, and the longer we shut out families, the more harm it will cause.

name: Mark Robinson
tweet: Bureaucrats have been working to silence and remove parents from their children's education, but enough is enough. We have experienced extreme learning loss in our state, and students feel disconnected and ultimately depressed by these continuous mandates.  https://t.co/DPPWcFTTSg

tweet: Throughout the pandemic, parents have voiced their concerns at school board meetings but the will of the people has been ignored. The endless masking of our children is unacceptable and it must end. Our children don’t need to be taught to “comply” -they need to be taught to read.
